definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: There didn't occur regurgitation cholangitis and bile duct cancers in this group.
sentences.chinese: 本組無反流性膽管炎及膽管癌發生。

sentences.english: There didn't occur regurgitation cholangitis and bile duct cancers in this group.
sentences.chinese: 本組無反流性膽管炎及膽管癌發生。

sentences.english: Both techniques delineated the location of occlusion in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 兩種成像技術顯示了所有病人胰膽管梗阻部位。

sentences.english: A cases with biliary cirrhosis and sclerotic cholangitis underwent the liver transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 肝移植治療一例膽汁性肝硬變，硬化性膽管炎。

sentences.english: The combination approach showed a clearer image of biliary tree and the lesions.
sentences.chinese: 可獲得清晰膽管樹及病變的圖像。

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and differential diagnosis of carcinoma in the middle and distal bile duct.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中下段膽管癌的診斷和鑑別診斷。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the method and result of surgical treatment for complex intrahepatic biliary calculi.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結複雜性肝內膽管結石的外科治療方法及效果。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the effectiveness of hepatectomy to treat stones in bile ducts within left lobes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝切除術治療左肝內膽管結石的療效。

sentences.english: The emphasis is focused on formation of hepatolithiasis stimulated by cholestasis.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹膽汁淤滯對形成肝內膽管結石的影響。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the diagnostic value of MSCT in the hepatic hilar cholangiocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高肝門部膽管癌的早期診斷水平。

sentences.english: Objective To improve diagnosis of hilar cholangiocarcinoma(HCCA).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高肝門部膽管癌的診斷水平。

sentences.english: While repairing donor liver, damage to the blood supply system of donor liver bile ducts should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 修肝時應維護肝外膽管的血供和警惕變異膽管的存在。

sentences.english: While repairing donor liver, damage to the blood supply system of donor liver bile ducts should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 修肝時應維護肝外膽管的血供和警惕變異膽管的存在。

sentences.english: Infection with liver flukes has been reported to be associated with some liver and gall diseases, especially the cholangiocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 肝吸蟲感染與一些肝膽疾病，特別是膽管癌有關。

sentences.english: Such masses may also focally obstruct the biliary tract and lead to an elevated alkaline phosphatase.
sentences.chinese: 腫物也可阻塞膽管，導致鹼性磷酸酶升高。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
